mapper.select: SELECT d.donation_id donationId, d.title, m.nickname, d.goal, d.current_amount currentAmount, f.file MPhoto, t.hash_tag hashTag FROM Donation d LEFT JOIN Tag t ON t.donation_id = d.donation_id LEFT JOIN DonationFile f ON f.donation_id = d.donation_id LEFT JOIN Member m ON d.member_id = m.member_id WHERE t.hash_tag = #{hashTag} GROUP BY d.donation_id ORDER BY d.donation_id DESC
